response.overview: A retired war veteran struggles to readjust to life back in The States while overcoming his drug addiction and finding a place in society. When his teenage nephew is bullied and brings a gun to school, Edward takes his troubled nephew on a journey to see their grandfather so that each can rediscover life together. Former Navy Seal, Jason Cabell, gives viewers an honest, in depth look, into the life of a veteran in his internationally acclaimed debut as a director.
response.tagline: A NAVY SEAL TAKES ON HIS MOST DIFFICULT ASSIGNMENT
response.title: Smoke Filled Lungs
